quiz_pages.question: Which beach?
quiz_pages.title: Rauhaniemi beach
quiz_pages.subtitle: You can walk to Rauhaniemi beach in 30 minutes or take bus number 2 to get there.
quiz_pages.info_text: One of Tampere's many public saunas is located in Rauhaniemi. Saunas are very popular among humans.
quiz_pages.robot_speech: One of Tampere's many public saunas is located in Rauhaniemi. Saunas are very popular among humans. However, I dare not to go there, because I would melt!

quiz_pages.question: Which building?
quiz_pages.title: Pyynikki observation tower
quiz_pages.subtitle: The Pyynikki observation tower offers a panoramic view of Tampere.
quiz_pages.info_text: Climbing the Pyynikki ridge is good for your health! Once there, you want to taste the munkkis!
quiz_pages.robot_speech: Climbing the Pyynikki ridge is good for your health! Once there, you want to taste the munkkis! They are delicious donuts that humans enjoy eating.

start_page.title: Welcome to the Tampere Quiz!
start_page.subtitle: I've been visiting different attractions and places in Tampere and I took lots of pictures from my journey. Would you like to guess the places I visited?
